TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi PeerNameResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定使用 PNRP 命名空间提供程序 API 协议将 解析为 的值。

span.span: Specifies the values that resolve a to a using the PNRP Namespace Provider API protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个 , 其中包含在或云中 ( 在解析过程中查询) 中发布的的所有信息。A which contains all the information for the that was published in the or cloud(s) that were queried during the resolve process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功解析后, 将包含在该操作过程中查询的云中发布的指定的所有信息。After successfully resolving a , the contains all the information for the specified that was published in the cloud(s) that were queried during the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnResolveCompleted(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 对象，包含 事件返回的数据。

span.span: The object that contains the data returned by the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件后，将返回对等解析数据。

span.span: Returns peer resolution data after the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一个异步回调, 用于在对等解析完成后处理对等名称解析数据。This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer name resolution data after peer resolution has completed. 派生类型可以重写此方法, 以便在对等解析程序对象引发事件时执行其他任务。Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event is raised by the peer resolver object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnResolveProgressChanged(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 对象，它包含由 事件返回的对等名称解析进度信息。

span.span: object that contains peer name resolution progress information returned by the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件时，将返回对等解析进度数据。

span.span: Returns peer resolution progress data when the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是在请求对等解析进度之后用于处理对等解析数据的异步回调。This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer resolution data after peer resolution progress has been requested. 派生类型可以重写此方法, 以便在事件发生时执行其他任务。Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.

para.span: 在派生类型中重写此方法时, 请确保调用基类型的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding this method in a derived type, be sure to call the base type's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 使用 PNRP 协议将 对象解析为 。

span.span: Resolves a object to a using the PNRP protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将对等名称与云相关联。This method associates peer names to clouds. 调用方法类似于对中的每个对等名称记录调用方法。 Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 请注意, 对单个对等名称记录使用 Resolve 方法不会使解析多个对等名称无效。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 对于每种方法, 都有等效的方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们在传递的参数中是相同的, 只不过 ResolveAsync 方法在其参数列表中包含用于异步事件处理的系统标记。They are identical in the parameters they are passed, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token in its parameter list for asynchronous event handling. 如果未提供 参数,则方法将使用快捷方式填写云参数。If the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters. 如果缺少参数, 则默认值为零会引发异常。 `maxRecords`If the `maxRecords` parameter is missing, the default value of zero causes an exception to be thrown. 如果解析操作在错误中完成或被取消, 也会引发此事件。This event will also be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection Resolve(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName peerName) cil managed

param.name: peerName
param.span: 要解析的 。

span.span: The to resolve.

summary.span: 解析调用对等方已知的所有群中指定的 。

span.span: Resolves the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

returns.span: 包含与指定的对等名称关联的所有对等名称记录（表示为 对象）的 。

span.span: A that contains all peer name records (represented as objects) associated with the specified peer name.

returns.span: 对于不安全的对等名称，可由不同的用户在同一个 中注册同一个 ，并将其与不同的终结点关联。

span.span: For unsecured peer names, the same can be registered by different users in the same , and associated with different endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将对等名称与云相关联。This method associates a peer name to clouds. 将查询所有云。All clouds are queried for the . 如果对等名称无法解析或为`null` , 则会引发。If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an is thrown. 对于不安全的对等名称, 同一个云中的不同对等方可以注册同一个名称 (并与不同的终结点相关联)。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 调用方法类似于对中的每个对等名称记录调用方法。 Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 请注意, 对单个对等名称记录使用 Resolve 方法不会使解析多个对等名称无效。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 对于每种方法, 都有等效的方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是相同的, 只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包含用于异步事件处理的系统标记。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果未提供 参数,则方法将使用快捷方式填写云参数。If the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters. 如果解析操作在错误中完成或被取消, 则会引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何解析在任何中发布的。The following code example illustrates how to resolve a published in any . [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPPeerNameResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPPeerNameResolver/CS/PeerNameResolver.cs#1)]

span.span: The parameter is set to .

exception.span: 指定的对等名称无法解析。

span.span: The peer name specified cannot be resolved.

span.span: Resolves the specified peer name in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than the specified number of objects.

returns.span: 大小小于或等于 条目的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将对等名称与云相关联。This method associates a peer name to clouds. 将查询所有云的对等名称。All clouds are queried for the peer name. 对于不安全的对等名称, 同一对等名称可以由相同的不同用户注册, 并与不同的终结点相关联。For unsecured peer names, the same peer name can be registered by different users in the same , and associated with different endpoints. 如果无法解析 (例如, 不发布对等名称 ), 则会引发。 If the cannot be resolved (for example, the peer name is not published) an is thrown. 对于每种方法, 都有等效的方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是相同的, 只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包含用于异步事件处理的系统标记。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. 如果解析操作在错误中完成或被取消, 则会引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

span.span: The parameter is set to .
The parameter is less than or equal to zero.

exception.span: 提供的对等名称无法解析。

span.span: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法解析 (即, 不发布对等名称 ), 则会引发。 If the cannot be resolved (that is, the peer name is not published) an is thrown. 对于不安全的对等名称, 同一个云中的不同对等方可以注册同一个名称 (并与不同的终结点相关联)。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 对于每种方法, 都有等效的方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是相同的, 只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包含用于异步事件处理的系统标记。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. `null` 如果参数为, 则使用快捷方式填充、 和。 If the parameter is `null`, the uses the shortcut to fill in the , , and . 如果解析操作在错误中完成或被取消, 则会引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于不安全的对等名称, 同一个云中的不同对等方可以注册同一个名称 (并与不同的终结点相关联)。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 如果对等名称无法解析, 则会引发。If the peer name cannot be resolved, an is thrown. 对于每种方法, 都有等效的方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是相同的, 只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包含用于异步事件处理的系统标记。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling. `null` 如果参数为, 则使用快捷方式填充、 和。 If the parameter is `null`, the uses the shortcut to fill in the , , and . 如果解析操作在错误中完成或被取消, 则会引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

summary.span: 这些方法在调用对等方已知的所有群中开始指定 的异步解析操作。

span.span: These methods begin an asynchronous resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于每种方法, 都有一个等效方法, 当需要异步处理时, 将使用该方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method, which is used when asynchronous processing is required. 它们在传递的参数中是相同的, 只是 ResolveAsync 在其参数列表中包含一个用于事件处理的系统令牌。They are identical in the parameters they are passed, except that ResolveAsync includes a system token in its parameter list for event handling. 如果解析方法与 ResolveAsync 方法之间发生参数不匹配, 并且未提供参数, 则该方法将使用快捷方式来填充云参数。If a parameter mismatch occurs between the Resolve method and the ResolveAsync method, and the parameter is not supplied, the method uses the shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResolveAsync (System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName peerName, object userState);
.method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAsync(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName peerName, object userState) cil managed

param.name: peerName
param.span: 要解析的 。

summary.span: 在调用对等方已知的所有云中为指定 开始异步对等名称解析操作。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法以异步方式将对等名称与云关联。This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds. 将查询所有云。All clouds are queried for the . 它引发事件, 该事件回调到方法。It raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者, 它引发事件, 该事件回调方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 如果对等名称无法解析, 则会引发。If the peer name cannot be resolved, an is thrown. 对于不安全的对等名称, 同一个云中的不同对等方可以注册同一个名称 (并与不同的终结点相关联)。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 调用方法类似于对中的每个对等名称记录调用方法。 Calling the method is similar to calling the method for each peer name record in the . 请注意, 对单个对等名称记录使用 Resolve 方法不会使解析多个对等名称无效。Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names. 对于每种方法, 都有等效的方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是相同的, 只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包含用于异步事件处理的系统标记, 解析方法用于同步处理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 对解析程序对象的所有异步引用均与唯一标识符标记进行协调。All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token. 此`userState`令牌或消息标识符允许操作系统将消息放入消息队列后, 将消息传递给单个接收进程。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析操作在错误中完成或被取消, 则会引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

exception.span: 将 和/或 参数设置为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法以异步方式将对等名称与云关联。This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds. 将查询所有云。All clouds are queried for the . 对于不安全的对等名称, 同一个云中的不同对等方可以注册同一个名称 (并与不同的终结点相关联)。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 如果对等名称无法解析或为`null` , 则会引发。If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an is thrown. 此方法引发事件, 该事件回调到方法。This method raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者, 它引发事件, 该事件回调方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. 对于每种方法, 都有等效的方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是相同的, 只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包含用于异步事件处理的系统标记, 解析方法用于同步处理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 对解析程序对象的所有异步引用均与唯一标识符标记进行协调。All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token . 此`userState`令牌或消息标识符允许操作系统将消息放入消息队列后, 将消息传递给单个接收进程。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析操作在错误中完成或被取消, 则会引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

span.span: The resolution operation will resolve no more than entries for the specified peer name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于不安全的对等名称, 同一个云中的不同对等方可以注册同一个名称 (并与不同的终结点相关联)。For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud. 此方法引发事件, 该事件回调到方法。This method raises the event, which calls back to the method. 或者, 它引发事件, 该事件回调方法。Or, it raises the event, which calls back to the method. `null` 如果参数为, 则 使用快捷方式解析名称, 这将初始化、和属性的默认值。 If the parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the shortcut, which initializes default values for the , , and properties. 对于每种方法, 都有等效的方法。For every method, there is an equivalent method. 它们的参数列表是相同的, 只不过 ResolveAsync 方法包含用于异步事件处理的系统标记, 解析方法用于同步处理。Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing. 对等解析程序对象的所有异步引用均与唯一标识符标记进行协调。All asynchronous references to the peer resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token . 此`userState`令牌或消息标识符允许操作系统将消息放入消息队列后, 将消息传递给单个接收进程。This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue. 如果解析操作在错误中完成或被取消, 则会引发事件。The event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.

exception.span: 将 和/或 参数设置为 。

span.span: One or both of the and parameters are set to .

exception.span: 提供的一个或多个参数均无效。

span.span: One or more supplied parameters are invalid.

exception.span: 要成功完成此操作至少需要一个事件处理程序。

span.span: Successful completion of this operation requires at least one event handler.
The parameter is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAsyncCancel(object userState) cil managed

param.name: userState
param.span: 向启动解析操作的 方法实例提供的对象。

span.span: The object provided to the method instance which started the resolve operation.

summary.span: 取消指定的异步对等名称解析请求。

span.span: Cancels the specified asynchronous peer name resolution request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可保证系统不会尝试获取指定的其他记录。Calling this method guarantees the system will not attempt to obtain additional records for the specified . 如果在异步对等名称解析操作未完成时调用此方法, 则该方法将充当 "无操作" (无操作)。If this method is called when an asynchronous peer name resolution operation is not outstanding, it acts as a "no operation" (NO OP). 必须`userState`提供对象, 因为在多个调用正在进行时, 它用于跟踪特定的异步调用。The `userState` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call when multiple calls are in progress. 此调用方提供的对象对于每个对等名称解析请求都是唯一的。This caller-supplied object is unique for each peer name resolution request. 此方法将立即返回, 但该操作可能会或不会立即取消。This method will return immediately, but the operation may or may not immediately cancel. 事件返回的事件参数包含一个字段, 该字段可由客户端轮询以确定是否发生了取消。The event arguments returned by the event contains a field which can be polled by clients to determine whether cancellation occurred. 调用此方法可确保 ResolveCompleted 事件将在事件参数设置为`true`的情况下尽快收到信号。Calling this method ensures the ResolveCompleted event will be signaled as soon as possible with the event argument set to `true`.

span.span: The parameters cannot be .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ResolveCompleted As EventHandler(Of ResolveCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 特定 的对等名称解析请求完成时发出 事件信号。

span.span: The event is signaled when a peer name resolution request for a specific has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于找到的每个终结点, 将引发一次事件,并且在找到所有终结点后,将只引发一次此事件。The event will be raised once for each endpoint found, and this event will be raised only once when all endpoints have been found. 如果操作在错误或被取消时完成, 也会引发此事件。This event will also be raised if the operation completes in error or is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ResolveProgressChanged As EventHandler(Of ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 每当发现 对象时会发出有关此事件的信号，以响应针对特定 的 操作。

span.span: This event is signaled whenever a object is found in response to a operation for a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在查询的云中存在多个对象, 则会为每个找到的事件终止一次此事件。If multiple objects exist in the cloud(s) being queried, this event is signaled once for each found.
